constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 57 (Thursday, March 31, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. JACKSON:
H.R. 7330.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H4074]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Keeping Israel Safe from Iranian Proxies Act
